product_name: ABS Vario Base Unit Avalanche Airbag Pack
long_description: The Vario Base Unit with the ABS TwinBag airbag system attaches easily to different sizes of required ABS Zip-On pack bodies (sold separately) so you can choose the pack size that's right for you.
short_description: The Vario Base Unit with the ABS TwinBag airbag system attaches easily to different sizes of required ABS Zip-On pack bodies (sold separately) so you can choose the pack size that's right for you.
